title: Language filter bug.
body:
Just tell me how to manually modify the file, and which file it is.

That or actually push out a fucking fix next patch (automatically) instead of making us do a bunch of convoluted stuff in an "attempt" to fix it ourselves. ty

EDIT: fixed mine. What's the point of beta testing the new client if it still uses settings files from the old one?

replies.body:
I've seen some reports on the language filter not toggling, but we currently have a manual method of getting that fixed up:

- Close League of Legends
- Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\(lat est version)\deploy\preferences
- Open up the shared(summoner name).PROPERTIES file up with Notepad
- It should say:
[Chat]
EnableChatFilter=1
- Just change the 1 to a 0. Hit Ctrl+S to save it.

Let me know if that helps!
I tried this and it was set to 0 already yet I still had words censored in my most reason game.  Any other ideas?

Not to my knowledge beyond that fix.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if it persists, and our tech team can work with you individually.  We'll look for more options if possible!
